content: this simple colour work pattern really highlights the colours in the variegated yarn the pattern is a simple repeat using slipped stitches to create the design and has an optional stripy sole being a shortie sock you only need about 30-45g of each colour for a pair depending on the size you make so it is perfect for using leftovers or even make a couple of pairs from 2 skeins the pattern is also easily adaptable to make a longer leg length if you desire just make sure you have enough yarn the sample shown is in fiori sock in midnight and rainbow it is the large size and fits a eu40 foot the finished pair of socks weigh 55g
